get.description:
<p>Required permission 'ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:LEADERBOARD [READ]'</p>
			<p>This endpoint return all leaderboard configurations</p>

parameters.description: The start position that points to query data
parameters.name: offset

get.summary: list all leaderboards by given namespace

get.description: <p>Admin Get signed url in an all time leaderboard that archived. Notes: This will be a bulk endpoint to get sign url</p>

parameters.description: list of leaderboard codes split by comma
parameters.name: leaderboardCodes

get.summary: Admin Get signed url for archive all time leaderboard ranking data

post.description:
<p>Required permission 'ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:LEADERBOARD [DELETE]'</p>
			<p>This endpoint delete multiple leaderboards configuration in one request</p>
post.summary: delete bulk leaderboards. response body will contains failed leaderboard with the reason why it's failed to delete

delete.description:
<p>Required permission 'ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:LEADERBOARD [DELETE]'</p>
			<p>This endpoint delete a leaderboard configuration</p>

parameters.description: human readable unique code to indentify leaderboard. Must be lowercase and maximum length is 48
parameters.name: leaderboardCode

			<p>This endpoint returns a leaderboard configuration</p>

get.description:
<p>Required permission 'ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:LEADERBOARD [READ]'</p>
			<p>Get rankings in current month leaderboard.</p>

parameters.description: the human readable unique code to identify the leaderboard. Must be lowercase and maximum length is 48
parameters.name: leaderboardCode

parameters.description: The start position that points to query data
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Specify specific version of leaderboard data, < 0 will be archived/history leaderboard data. Currently only support 1 previous version, default value will be 0 (active leaderboard)
parameters.name: previousVersion

get.summary: Get current month leaderboard ranking data

parameters.description: human readable unique code to indentify leaderboard. Must be lowercase and maximum length is 48
parameters.name: leaderboardCode

delete.summary: delete all user ranking by leaderboard code

get.description:
<p>Required permission 'ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:LEADERBOARD [READ]'</p>
			<p>Get rankings in today leaderboard.</p>

parameters.name: leaderboardCode

parameters.description: The start position that points to query data

parameters.description: Specify specific version of leaderboard data, < 0 will be archived/history leaderboard data. Currently only support 1 previous version, default value will be 0 (active leaderboard)

delete.description:
Delete user ranking
Required permission: ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:LEADERBOARD:USER [DELETE]

Remove entry with provided userId from leaderboard. 
If leaderboard with given leaderboard code not found, it will return http status not found (404).
If the leaderboard is found and no entry found in it, it will still return success (204)

parameters.description: the human readable unique code to identify the leaderboard. Must be lowercase and maximum length is 48
parameters.name: leaderboardCode

parameters.description: User ID used for leaderboard entry
parameters.name: userId

get.description:
<p>Required permission 'ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:LEADERBOARD [READ]'</p>
			<p>Get user ranking in leaderboard</p>

parameters.description: the human readable unique code to identify the leaderboard. Must be lowercase and maximum length is 48
parameters.name: leaderboardCode

parameters.description: Specify specific version of leaderboard data, < 0 will be archived/history leaderboard data. Currently only support 1 previous version, default value will be 0 (active leaderboard)
parameters.name: previousVersion

get.summary: Get user ranking

parameters.description: the human readable unique code to identify the leaderboard. Must be lowercase and maximum length is 48
parameters.name: leaderboardCode

parameters.description: User ID, should follow UUID version 4 without hyphen
parameters.name: userId

delete.description:
Delete user ranking
Required permission: NAMESPACE:{namespace}:LEADERBOARD:USER:{userId} [DELETE]

Remove entry with provided userId from leaderboard. 
If leaderboard with given leaderboard code not found, it will return http status not found (404).
If the leaderboard is found and no entry found in it, it will still return success (204)

parameters.name: leaderboardCode

parameters.description: User ID used for leaderboard entry
parameters.name: userId
